subject: Basketball
Playoff Games
lead_paragraph: On a roster full of seasoned players, Iman Shumpert, who is the youngest Knick, said the team did not take care of the little things in its playoff loss to the Pacers.
snippet: On a roster full of seasoned players, Iman Shumpert, who is the youngest Knick, said the team did not take care of the little things in its playoff loss to the Pacers.
